name: Downblast
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021!
When I started the Jam I already had the project going for about 2 hours and I already had a plan for the game in my mind. I wanted to make a Rougelite! I adapted my plans to fit the given time and scale of the jam. The Project will be continued after the jam :)

You have to descend into the caves deep down to face the evil "Chaos"! Once you beat him you can still play further.

Controls:

A/D = Left/Right
W/Space = Jump;
S = Fall through Platform
Move Mouse = Change direction
Mouse Button Left = Shoot
Mouse Button Right = Meele

Bugs I know about:
- Sometimes the snails crawl under the ground
- The SFX/Music volume can sometimes only be turned down xD
- Energy Orbs get stuck in the ground
- You can´t continue your run sometimes because you get stuck in the ground

To fix the SFX/Music Bug you can
-> search for %localappdata% and open the Downblast folder
-> change audio_volume to a value (0-1)
